name: A More Perfect Union (BrianDonaldson1)
description: It is time for the Presidential Election of 2020! The United States is split in half by two parties, the REPUBLICANS and the DEMOCRATS. In this divide, there is absolute chaos and it is your job as part of the new third party, the UNITED NATIONAL ALLIANCE, to win the election and help eliminate the growing division in America, to restore peace and justice to the United States.
